caption:
This photograph captures a lively winter scene at a ski resort. In the foreground, there are several skiers around a rack packed with a variety of skis and ski poles. The skiers are dressed in typical winter sporting attire, including thick, colorful winter jackets and ski pants. The focal activity involves a few of these individuals bending over, likely adjusting their ski boots or fastening their skis.

The scene takes place on a clear day as the snow around them glistens brightly under what seems to be sunlight. The background is filled with a snowy slope dotted with bare trees, indicating a mountainous terrain typical of ski resorts. The overall ambiance reflects that of a busy day at the slopes with skiers preparing or taking a break from their activities. The image conveys a sense of winter joy and the recreational spirit of ski sport.
title: The careful skier is equipped with safety straps so that if his skis are released in a fall they remain attached to his boots runaway skis are a danger to other skiers
